column4: some1 plz help me - I have a Compaq Presario 2500 laptop with Broadcom BCM4306 Wireless LAN and I've been trying to get the wireless work all day.  this is my first day on linux (ubuntu).  How do I get this working?

have you plugged a cable into your computer and done all update?  this will help with the next step sometimes.  System / Admin / Hardware Drivers - do you see anything about your wireless that you can enable?
- How do I do an update?  I am connected with an ethernet cable
